verses.verse: Bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>. O LORD <WH3068> my God <WH430>, thou art very <WH3966> great <WH1431>; thou art clothed <WH3847> with honour <WH1935> and majesty <WH1926>.
Who coverest <WH5844> thyself with light <WH216> as with a garment <WH8008>: who stretchest out <WH5186> the heavens <WH8064> like a curtain <WH3407>:

Who layeth the beams <WH7136> of his chambers <WH5944> in the waters <WH4325>: who maketh <WH7760> the clouds <WH5645> his chariot <WH7398>: who walketh <WH1980> upon the wings <WH3671> of the wind <WH7307>:
Who maketh <WH6213> his angels <WH4397> spirits <WH7307>; his ministers <WH8334> a flaming <WH3857> fire <WH784>:
Who laid <WH3245> the foundations <WH4349> of the earth <WH776>, that it should not be removed <WH4131> for ever <WH5769> <WH5703>. Who: Heb. He hath founded the earth upon her bases
Thou coveredst <WH3680> it with the deep <WH8415> as with a garment <WH3830>: the waters <WH4325> stood <WH5975> above the mountains <WH2022>.
At <WH4480> thy rebuke <WH1606> they fled <WH5127>; at the voice <WH6963> of thy thunder <WH7482> they hasted <WH2648> away.

They go up <WH5927> by the mountains <WH2022>; they go down <WH3381> by the valleys <WH1237> unto the place <WH4725> which <WH2088> thou hast founded <WH3245> for them. They go up: or, The mountains ascend, the valleys descend
Thou hast set <WH7760> a bound <WH1366> that they may not pass over <WH5674>; that they turn not again <WH7725> to cover <WH3680> the earth <WH776>.
He sendeth <WH7971> the springs <WH4599> into the valleys <WH5158>, which run <WH1980> among the hills <WH2022>. He: Heb. Who run: Heb. walk
They give drink <WH8248> to every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>: the wild asses <WH6501> quench <WH7665> their thirst <WH6772>. quench: Heb. break
By them shall the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064> have their habitation <WH7931>, which sing <WH5414> <WH6963> among <WH996> the branches <WH6073>. sing: Heb. give a voice
He watereth <WH8248> the hills <WH2022> from his chambers <WH5944>: the earth <WH776> is satisfied <WH7646> with the fruit <WH6529> of thy works <WH4639>.

He causeth the grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> for the cattle <WH929>, and herb <WH6212> for the service <WH5656> of man <WH120>: that he may bring forth <WH3318> food <WH3899> out of the earth <WH776>;

And wine <WH3196> that maketh glad <WH8055> the heart <WH3824> of man <WH582>, and oil <WH8081> to make his face <WH6440> to shine <WH6670>, and bread <WH3899> which strengtheneth <WH5582> man's <WH582> heart <WH3824>. oil: Heb. to make his face shine with oil, or, more than oil
The trees <WH6086> of the LORD <WH3068> are full <WH7646> of sap; the cedars <WH730> of Lebanon <WH3844>, which he hath planted <WH5193>;
Where the birds <WH6833> make their nests <WH7077>: as for the stork <WH2624>, the fir trees <WH1265> are her house <WH1004>.
The high <WH1364> hills <WH2022> are a refuge <WH4268> for the wild goats <WH3277>; and the rocks <WH5553> for the conies <WH8227>.
He appointed <WH6213> the moon <WH3394> for seasons <WH4150>: the sun <WH8121> knoweth <WH3045> his going down <WH3996>.
Thou makest <WH7896> darkness <WH2822>, and it is night <WH3915>: wherein all the beasts <WH2416> of the forest <WH3293> do creep <WH7430> forth. beasts: Heb. beasts thereof do trample on the forest
The young lions <WH3715> roar <WH7580> after their prey <WH2964>, and seek <WH1245> their meat <WH400> from God <WH410>.
The sun <WH8121> ariseth <WH2224>, they gather themselves together <WH622>, and lay them down <WH7257> in their dens <WH4585>.
Man <WH120> goeth forth <WH3318> unto his work <WH6467> and to his labour <WH5656> until the evening <WH6153>.
O LORD <WH3068>, how manifold <WH7231> are thy works <WH4639>! in wisdom <WH2451> hast thou made <WH6213> them all: the earth <WH776> is full <WH4390> of thy riches <WH7075>.
So is this great <WH1419> and wide <WH7342> <WH3027> sea <WH3220>, wherein are things creeping <WH7431> innumerable <WH4557>, both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419> beasts <WH2416>.
There go <WH1980> the ships <WH591>: there is that leviathan <WH3882>, whom thou hast made <WH3335> to play <WH7832> therein. made: Heb. formed
These wait <WH7663> all upon thee; that thou mayest give <WH5414> them their meat <WH400> in due season <WH6256>.
That thou givest <WH5414> them they gather <WH3950>: thou openest <WH6605> thine hand <WH3027>, they are filled <WH7646> with good <WH2896>.
Thou hidest <WH5641> thy face <WH6440>, they are troubled <WH926>: thou takest away <WH622> their breath <WH7307>, they die <WH1478>, and return <WH7725> to their dust <WH6083>.
Thou sendest <WH7971> forth thy spirit <WH7307>, they are created <WH1254>: and thou renewest <WH2318> the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
The glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> shall endure for ever <WH5769>: the LORD <WH3068> shall rejoice <WH8055> in his works <WH4639>. endure: Heb. be
He looketh <WH5027> on the earth <WH776>, and it trembleth <WH7460>: he toucheth <WH5060> the hills <WH2022>, and they smoke <WH6225>.
I will sing <WH7891> unto the LORD <WH3068> as long as I live <WH2416>: I will sing <WH2167> praise to my God <WH430> while I have my being <WH5750>.
My meditation <WH7879> of him shall be sweet <WH6149>: I will be glad <WH8055> in the LORD <WH3068>.

Let the sinners <WH2400> be consumed <WH8552> out of the earth <WH776>, and let the wicked <WH7563> be no more. Bless <WH1288> thou the LORD <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>. Praise <WH1984> ye the LORD <WH3050>.
